Package DAO

Class DataAccessObject<T extends DataTransferObject,U>

java.lang.Object
DAO.DataAccessObject<T,U>
Direct Known Subclasses:
AppointmentDaoImpl, CustomerDaoImpl
public abstract class DataAccessObject<T extends DataTransferObject,U> extends Object
Data Access Object that interacts with Data Transfer Objects.
Version:
2022.08.06
Author:
Joseph Curtis

  • Field Details

    • dataSource

      protected final DataSource dataSource

  • Constructor Details

    • DataAccessObject

      public DataAccessObject()
      Constructor for DAO with provided dataSource object from DBUtil. Datasource is used to get connections to database.

      Use getConnection() method within a try-with-resources block.

  • Method Details

    • getAll

      abstract javafx.collections.ObservableList<T> getAll() throws Exception
      Returns:
      all the DTO records as an observable list.
      Throws:
      Exception - if any error occurs.

    • getById

      abstract Optional<T> getById(int id) throws Exception
      Parameters:
      id - unique identifier of the DTO record.
      Returns:
      an optional container with a DTO record. if one with id exists, empty optional otherwise.
      Throws:
      Exception - if any error occurs.

    • add

      abstract boolean add(T dto, U user) throws Exception
      Parameters:
      dto - the DTO record to be added.
      user - the currently logged-in user.
      Returns:
      true if DTO record was added, false if record already exists or if add failed.
      Throws:
      Exception - if any error occurs.

    • update

      abstract boolean update(T dto, U user) throws Exception
      Parameters:
      dto - the DTO record to be updated.
      user - the currently logged-in user.
      Returns:
      true if DTO record exists and is updated, else false.
      Throws:
      Exception - if any error occurs.

    • delete

      abstract boolean delete(int id) throws Exception
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the record to be deleted.
      Returns:
      true if record exists and is deleted, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      Exception - if any error occurs.

    • createRecordFromResultSet

      protected abstract T createRecordFromResultSet(ResultSet resultSet) throws Exception
      Create a DTO from SQL result set.
      Parameters:
      resultSet - object from SQL query
      Returns:
      the Data Transfer Object
      Throws:
      Exception - if any error occurs.
